titles.title: To modify the project for flood control, James River Basin, Richmond, Virginia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-235.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 129.

action.text: Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 244.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 8/2/1993--Introduced. Modifies the project for flood control, James River Basin, Richmond, Virginia, to increase the total cost authorized for such project.
